content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'demoDB')
    CREATE DATABASE demoDB
GO

USE demoDB
GO

-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Password01'
-- GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL myCredentialSAS
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-12-25T01:06:55Z&st=2024-10-20T16:06:55Z&spr=https&sig=MytV9E6HHchIDFYFwzJR8ZcGXb5SsE9HmKaE1qxjtwc%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE myDataSourceSAS WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://lhadlsgen2storage.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = myCredentialSAS
)
